alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:44AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches along the I-80 east of Wendover and the greater Dugway area. 1 to 3 inches is expected in Wendover, Rosette and Park Valley. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on SR-196, SR-199 and I-80, especially from Knolls to Grantsville. Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
